cs.DC, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning to optimize the use of idle resources in volunteer computing environments. This involves predicting idle time on different computers and targeting tasks accordingly to reduce wasted energy. This topic is relevant to several sub-categories, including Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE), and Systems and Control (cs.SY).
